root.name: Kajiri Kamui Kagura
root.description: OverviewKajiri Kamui Kagura is a visual novel developed by light. Set in Ashihara no Nakatsukuni (mythological Japan), it follows a group of warriors who must face the demons of the eastern realm alone after the gods seals itself away from man.Originally an eroge released for Windows in 2011, it was ported to the PlayStation Vita in 2013 with the adult content removed.
